mapper.select: -- count(distinct m.id)是为了去重 select m.*, count(distinct m.id) from abnormal_image ai join abnormal_record ar on ar.id = ai.abnormal_record_id join task_record tr on tr.id = ar.task_record_id join process_record pr on pr.id =tr.process_record_id join machine m on m.id = pr.machine_id where ar.id = #{abnormalRecordId}

select m.*, count(distinct m.id) from quality_record_image qri join task_quality_record tqr on tqr.id = qri.task_quality_record_id join task_record tr on tr.id = tqr.task_record_id join process_record pr on pr.id = tr.process_record_id join machine m on m.id = pr.machine_id where qri.task_quality_record_id = #{taskQualityRecordId}

SELECT m.*, mo.* FROM machine m LEFT JOIN machine_order mo ON mo.id = m.order_id WHERE mo.order_num = #{orderNum} -- 首先查该订单的机器 AND ( nameplate NOT IN ( -- 再查该订单已经排产了该工序的机器， 并排除 SELECT m.nameplate FROM machine m left JOIN install_plan ip ON m.id = ip.machine_id left JOIN machine_order mo ON mo.id = m.order_id left JOIN install_group ig ON ig.id = ip.install_group_id left JOIN task ON ig.id = task.group_id WHERE ip.id IS NOT NULL AND ig.id = #{installGroupId} AND mo.order_num = #{orderNum} GROUP BY nameplate ) )
SELECT * FROM machine where 1=1 and nameplate=#{nameplate}
